actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to provide that it shall be an unfair labor practice for an employer to advertise for employees during a strike unless such advertisement states that a labor dispute exists.

summary.text: Provides, under the National Labor Relations Act, that it shall be an unfair labor practice for an employer to advertise by means of specified methods for employees during a strike unless such advertisement states that a labor dispute exists and contains the name of the person making such advertisement.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to provide that it shall be an unfair labor practice for an employer to advertise for employees during a strike unless such advertisement states that a labor dispute exists.
